name: openai-assistants
description: Complete guide for OpenAIs Assistants API v2: stateful conversational AI with built-in tools (Code Interpreter, File Search, Function Calling), vector stores for RAG (up to 10,000 files), thread/run lifecycle management, and streaming patterns. Both Node.js SDK and fetch approaches. ⚠️ DEPRECATION NOTICE: OpenAI plans to sunset Assistants API in H1 2026 in favor of Responses API. This skill remains valuable for existing apps and migration planning. Use when: building stateful chatbots with O
